channel.title: Help - Really Desperate
channel.description:
Ok first of all whoever actually sorts this out gets moderator on the server ( may sound a bit newby ) but its going to be a economy server, vps everything..
ok heres the problem-
i start any server.. ive tried loads , also many clients ive tried loads of them ..
Ok well i start server,client i can easily join using 127.0.0.1 - but when i try to use my no-ip one.. and i know it actually works , a server console error comes up in the server CMD -
ClientHandler: Client null disconnected ( MY IP HERE ) socket closed java.net.SocketException: socket closed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:9088) at client.run(client.java:17458) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
If you could help me
xtrivia-virus@hotmail.co.uk
Also it dont even login one bit.. just says - Login server something

item.title: Help - Really Desperate
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

do you have the newest java? u need to have that. if u do then its most likely ur computer is too new. it happened to my friend before we just had to use his laptop to download the clients and play

Read full topic

item.title: Help - Really Desperate
item.dc:creator: @Unruling Unruling
item.description:
@Unruling wrote:

you think im an idiot?.. No… thats the most obvious thing ever,

NOTE - i start any server… ive tried loads , also many clients ive tried loads of them …

Read full topic

item.title: Help - Really Desperate
item.dc:creator: @zachrida zachrida
item.description:
@zachrida wrote:

you search your client by pressing ctrl + h and type 127.0.0.1 an change it with your no-ip ip

Read full topic
